column5: my bud jamie asked if i wanted to head out for a few hrs on lake o today!!! since the rivers were dead i jumped on the offer!!! 4 nice browns  a sheepshead and my first smallmouth ever!!! great mix of fix!!!
nice fish man congrats on ur first smallie many more to come for u

OH MY GOD!!!!  he took a pic of an oos fish! hurry up internet police, get him  lol it looks like you had fun. thats seriously your first smallmouth? i would have thought that someone that catches so many steelhead would have caught other species before settling on steelhead.
OOS PIC ALERT!
Nice going!

CC- That is awesome you caught your first smallie.... Now just imagine that smallie going 5lbs+ in some current on light tackle and you get an idea of what all the excitement is about with them.  Sorry to hear the tribs are/were dead on Lake O. I went to one on Lake Huron and had my best morning there ever. I went 2/3 on rainbow, and didn't even feed one sucker any of my roe LOL.
tx all!!!! and no probs from the mnr on the oos fish!!! was told by a co to my face a quick pic and back in the drink is ok!!!
Nice mix of fish indeed.  How deep were you fishing?  Thanks for sharing
Nice fish! Looks like a Meegs jig stuck in the tail of the first one LOL!
Beauty fish, congrats.
15FT DOWN!!!! FUNNY IN WAS A ROE BAG IN HIS BUTT!!!MINNOW IN THE MOUTH ROE IN THE BUTT  LOL PULLED THE HOOK OUT FOR THE LITTLE GUY!!
Ahhh! But the OFC rules say no OOS pics...
OHHH MY BAD   DID KNOW!!! WILL TAKE CARE OF IT!!!
Nice fish! Congrats on your first smallie!
A nice day and catch.  Congrats CC.

Oh no CC your line was infested by a smallie now you won't be able to keep em off yer hook.... lol Good job On The big lake O. I started my boat project with a ton of fire but now its half done sitting in the garage.... I need to get it done So I can enjoy Lake O fishing ...
Looks like a fun successful day! If you ever get out to that spot in mid-winter you'll catch an insane amount of doubleheaders of mixed species like this.   nice going,  ehg
Nice browns CC...
Scott...so it isn't enough for you to catch everything from the tribs?? Now you have to catch them before they even get there?? LOL.  Great job out there...these warm weather reports are killing me!!
Nice report and pics!
WTG CC nice catch of Browns and congrats on your first smallie which I did see before the OOS police found it.Different to see a blue background in your net.  MTP
was nice to get out there!!! even in 25ft of water i could count the rocks on the bottom it was so clear!!! pretty awsome seeing tons of fish swimming under the boat though!!
I don't see any picture of a smallie ? Am I missing something? Must have been pulled by the internet police !!!LOl nice report as usual.
